definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively

sentences.english: Have you decided whether you want me to ship via UPS or provide you with a refund.
sentences.chinese: 你覺定好了是要我用聯邦快遞還是給你退款。

sentences.english: It was a FedEx delivery man, with a copy of a book on Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 是聯邦快遞的投遞員，給她送來了一本中國歷史書。

sentences.english: Federal Express, a company internationally know for excellent service to its customers.
sentences.chinese: 素以優質服務而享譽全球的聯邦快遞公司。
我一會就聯邦快遞寄過去。

sentences.english: Wages at UPS are 27% higher for those with representation than they are for non-union members.
sentences.chinese: 聯邦快遞代表的工資比起非工會成員高出了27%。

sentences.english: Yoox and FedEx declined to specify the financial details of their arrangement.
sentences.chinese: Yoox和聯邦快遞拒絕透露雙方合作的財務細節。

sentences.english: Fred Smith, and I understand that Federal Express is fairly substantial in China now as well.
sentences.chinese: 我知道聯邦快遞在中國也業績斐然。

sentences.english: FedEx trucks advertise that they are faster than the competition.
sentences.chinese: 聯邦快遞的卡車廣告宣稱他們比競爭對手更快。

definition: Time Warner Inc., US media company
to dismiss with severance pay/to pay sb off

lit. secretly crossing the Wei River 渭河[Wei4 He2] at Chencang (idiom, refers to a stratagem used by Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] in 206 BC against Xiang Yu 項羽|项羽[Xiang4 Yu3] of Chu)/fig. to feign one thing while doing another/to cheat under cover of a diversion
toss a peach, get back a plum (idiom); to return a favor/to exchange gifts/Scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours.
